sentences.en: But their words helped pierce the concrete and concertina wire of the Iron Curtain.
sentences.cn: 但是这些话穿透了铁幕的水泥墙和铁丝网.

sentences.en: Fanfold: Also called Accordion fold , Concertina fold , Over and back fold , Zigzag fold.
sentences.cn: 扇形摺: 亦称风琴摺, 之字摺.

sentences.en: High stone walls topped with snaky concertina wire, set off at intervals by looming guard towers.
sentences.cn: 顶部装着蛇腹式铁丝网的高高的石墙, 被渐渐隐现的哨塔隔开.

sentences.en: Its main bridge - a huge concrete structure - now lies concertina ed on the riverbed.
sentences.cn: 钢筋混凝土结构的主要桥梁,被扭扁坍塌在河床.

trans.tran_cn: 类似风琴的六角形的乐器
trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a small  accordion  , that you hold in both hands and play by pressing in from each side

trans.tran_cn: （像六角手风琴一样）折起，折叠
